Hyerin

15 years old
Group (2024-present):
HITGS

Introduction

Hyerin is a South Korean singer under H Music Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group HITGS.

She was revealed as the first member of H Entertainment's upcoming girl group, tentatively named Project H 2025, on December 9, 2024 while appearing at a TIRTIR pop-up store event alongside WOOAH's Nana and Wooyeon.
